description.narrative: Output 7.5. Systems are strengthened to promote the participation of children and adolescents, especially the marginalized and excluded, in decision-making at national and local levels., which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 7: Improved policy environment and equitable systems for disadvantaged and excluded children, guided by evidence and meaningful participation of children at national and decentralized levels

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF FINANCE AND ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT

sector.narrative: Child marriage - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use

PF4C - domestic revenue mobilization and access to finance for key social services

description.narrative: Development Partner affairs policy planning and administration

title.narrative: Description of UNICEF programming approach framework at the country level with Common Country Assessments (CCAs) providing the equivalence of pre project appraisals

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 7.5. Systems are strengthened to promote the participation of children and adolescents, especially the marginalized andexcluded, in decision-making at national and local levels.

actual.value: 2014:10 (Zimbabwe Youth Council, Barclays, UDACIZA, Econet, Midlands State University, Zimbabwe Union of Journalists, Harare International Festival of the Arts, Zimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation, Sunday Mail, Y-zone radio programme)

title.narrative: Number of children and youths consulted during formulation of key development plans (2016-2020 country programme, youth participation strategy, Junior Councils Operational Framework, MDG reporting, Junior Parliament Orientation manual).

actual.value: 2014:6 (launch of the national campaign against sexual violence of children, the International Day of the Girl Child, the Day of the African Child, the Universal Children's Day, the launch of the Life Skills, Sexuality and HIV & AIDS Education Strategy, and the media roundtable on disabilities)
